Example Padded Module (Gray Background)

Here is some black text. The header has a class padding-top-20 and padding-bottom-20 to give it some spacing. The whole row has a class named gray-bg which gives the full row with a maximum width of 1500px a standard gray background color. There is also a paragraph p class named spaced which gives it extra room also.

The paragraphs p also are using a class named spaced which gives them extra room.

The following is a button. Each button has an additional class which signifies it's left-side green image. This particular one uses btn-header-clock

Here is the button markup:

<button type='button' class='btn btn-default btn-alt btn-header-clock'>
Start, Stop or Move Services
</button>
